mapper.sql: mao.id as id, mao.winery_adjust_wine_id as winery_adjust_wine_id, mao.mbr_id as mbr_id, mao.winery_id as winery_id, mao.pay_mode as pay_mode, mao.pay_total_amt as pay_total_amt, mao.pay_real_amt as pay_real_amt, mao.print_img as print_img, mao.order_status as order_status, mao.transaction_no as transaction_no, mao.order_no as order_no, mao.pay_date as pay_date, mao.create_date as create_date, mao.modify_date as modify_date
mapper.insert: insert into m_mbr_adjust_order (id, winery_adjust_wine_id, mbr_id, winery_id, pay_mode, pay_total_amt, pay_real_amt, print_img, order_status, transaction_no, order_no, pay_date, create_date, modify_date) values (#{id}, #{wineryAdjustWineId}, #{mbrId}, #{wineryId}, #{payMode}, #{payTotalAmt}, #{payRealAmt}, #{printImg}, #{orderStatus}, #{transactionNo}, #{orderNo}, #{payDate}, #{createDate}, #{modifyDate})
mapper.update:
update m_mbr_adjust_order
winery_adjust_wine_id = #{wineryAdjustWineId},
mbr_id = #{mbrId},
winery_id = #{wineryId},
pay_mode = #{payMode},
pay_total_amt = #{payTotalAmt},
pay_real_amt = #{payRealAmt},
print_img = #{printImg},
order_status = #{orderStatus},
transaction_no = #{transactionNo},
order_no = #{orderNo},
pay_date = #{payDate},
create_date = #{createDate},
modify_date = #{modifyDate},
where id = #{id}
